mapper.insert: insert into ex_book (book_no, book_title, book_author, book_description, book_publisher ,book_price, book_regDate, book_quantity, book_img, book_category, book_sellCount) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{author}, #{description}, #{publisher}, #{price}, now(), #{quantity}, #{img}, #{category}, 0)
mapper.select: select book_no as no, book_title as title, book_author as author, book_description as description, book_publisher as publisher, book_price as price, book_regDate as regDate, book_quantity as quantity, book_img as img, book_category as category, book_sellCount as sellCount from ex_book order by book_no desc
